004007.description:
[Экономика]

Переместите ваши караваны на расстояние до 6 ячеек каждый. Они могут пересекать лишь ячейки соответствующие типу местности текущего слота, а также воду.

Затем вы можете обменять 1 ваш ресурс на любой другой ресурс с рынка.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
004007.name: Паровой двигатель

057419.description:
[Наука]

Получите 1 жетон торговли с рынка и поместите его на одну из ваших карт действий.

Затем поверните ваш диск технологий на число равное номеру этого слота.

+1 к повороту диска технологий
057419.name: Математика

07a146.description: Защищая или атакуя цель, отличную от Карфагена, добавьте себе по 1 боевому бонусу за каждые город-государство и дружественный город в пределах 2 ячеек от защищаемой ячейки.
07a146.name: Карфаген

08991c.description:
[Промышленность]

Постройте 1 чудо света. Количество единиц вашего производства равно номеру этого слота.

Или постройте 1 город на ячейке соответствующей типу местности текущего слота и на расстоянии до 2 ячеек от дружественной территории.

Чудеса света дают мощные, уникальные эффекты их владельцам. Города расширяют доступ игроков к новым областям карты и увеличивают количество чудес света, которые игрок может построить.

+1 к производству чудес света
08991c.name: Гончарное дело

09140a.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Выполните до 2 атак в пределах 3 ячеек от дружественной территории. Ваш боевой бонус равен номеру этого слота плюс 2. Вы можете пересекать воду.

Затем укрепите ваши жетоны контроля в количестве, не превышающем номеру этого слота минус 1 за каждую выполненную вами атаку.

+1 боевой бонус
09140a.name: Массовое производство

0a7aea.description:
Ходзё Токимунэ

[Божественный ветер]

Во время вашего хода сложность ячеек Пустыня и Горы, примыкающих к Воде или краю карты, равна 3.

Технологии:
1. Гончарное дело.
2. Международная торговля.
3. Каменная кладка.
4. Астрология.
5. Ранняя империя.
0a7aea.name: Япония

0a939d.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the orange player.
0a939d.name: Joint War

0cba42.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number, or, if this card is in the fifth slot, your production equals 7.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 4 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 к производству чудес света
0cba42.name: Nationalism

0eb074.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
0eb074.name: Capitalism

127708.description:
Catherine de Medici

[Grand Tour]

When resolving your culture focus card, place additional control tokens based on your latest-era world wonder:
 - Ancient: 1 token
 - Medieval: 2 tokens
 - Modern: 3 tokens

Технологии:
1. Каменная кладка.
2. Астрология.
3. Международная торговля.
4. Гончарное дело.
5. Ранняя империя.
127708.name: France

13573d.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, place 1 control token on a space matching this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly space.

+1 Control Token
13573d.name: Civil Service

13acc2.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the blue player is attacking.
13acc2.name: Defensive Pact

1420f8.description: The blue player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
1420f8.name: Open Borders

16a874.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokesn expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control token
16a874.name: Early Empire

1725c0.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number, or, if this card is in the fifth slot, your production equals 7.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 4 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 к производству чудес света
1725c0.name: Nationalism

1b0990.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokesn expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control token
1b0990.name: Early Empire

1d5fe6.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When defending, increase your combat value by 2.

Barbarians cannot move into spaces containing your cities or reinforced control tokens.
1d5fe6.name: Petra

2387dc.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

Once per turn, after you resolve the card in the fifth slot of your focus row, you may resolve it again, treating it as if it was in the first slot.
2387dc.name: Venetian Arsenal

243e9b.description: At the start of your turn, you may move 1 barbarian to an adjacent, empty space.
243e9b.name: Сеул

252760.description:
[Наука]

Gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply. You cannot gain a resource of a type that you already have.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
252760.name: Replaceable Parts

258bb7.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 3 spaces of a friendly space.

Or, build 1 city on an empty space of this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly caravan.

+1 к производству чудес света
258bb7.name: Animal Husbandry

2a9b16.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 1, or plus 3 if attacking a barbarian.

+1 боевой бонус
2a9b16.name: Iron Working

2c9f26.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
2c9f26.name: Capitalism

2dacf4.description:
[Culture]

Place 3 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, choose a rival control token within 2 spaces of a friendly space. If the rival token is unreinforced, replace it with 1 of your control tokens on then unreinforced side. If the rival token is reinforced, flip it to its unreinforced side.

+1 Control Token
2dacf4.name: Mass Media

3805be.description: When you are placing control tokens, the difficulty of all terrain is reduced by 1.
3805be.name: Mohenjo Daro

3a2f94.description:
[Наука]

If you resolved this card in the fifth slot, choose 1 space. In that space and all adjacent spaces, destroy all unreinforced control tokens and flip all reinforced control tokens to their unreinforced side.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
3a2f94.name: Nuclear Power

3b2931.description: When you move a caravan to the red player's capital (including the one used to take this card), place 1 trade token from the supply on a card in that player's focus row. Then, gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply.
3b2931.name: Embassy

3d31ce.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space or this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

Then, if you build a city, place up to 2 control tokens adjacent to that city. Those tokens can be placed on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

+1 к производству чудес света
3d31ce.name: Urbanization

3ee748.description:
[Culture]

Place 3 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, choose a rival control token within 2 spaces of a friendly space. If the rival token is unreinforced, replace it with 1 of your control tokens on then unreinforced side. If the rival token is reinforced, flip it to its unreinforced side.

+1 Control Token
3ee748.name: Mass Media

402516.description:
[Наука]

If you resolved this card in the fifth slot, choose 1 space. In that space and all adjacent spaces, destroy all unreinforced control tokens and flip all reinforced control tokens to their unreinforced side.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
402516.name: Nuclear Power

4160e6.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 3 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Caravans travel to city-states and rival cities to gain trade tokens and diplomacy cards. Trade tokens increase a focus card's effect as descrived at the bottom of that card.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
4160e6.name: Foreign Trade

42a46a.description: The green player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
42a46a.name: Open Borders

470e65.description:
[Экономика]

Переместите ваши караваны на расстояние до 6 ячеек каждый. Они могут пересекать лишь ячейки соответствующие типу местности текущего слота, а также воду.

Затем вы можете обменять 1 ваш ресурс на любой другой ресурс с рынка.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
470e65.name: Паровой двигатель

484c05.description:
There are three bags (each with four tiles) and four tiles in this bag. 

Randomly select two City States and two Wonders.  These tiles create the Core.   The rest will be shuffled into bag "REMAINING". 

Randomly deal one Capital tile and two remaining tiles to each player.
484c05.name: ADVANCED MAP BUILDING

48d8f6.description: When attacking a city or a city-state other than Kabul, increase your combat value by 3.
48d8f6.name: Kabul

49640c.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, you may move 1 of your control tokens to an adjacent, non-water space that is empty (dous not contain a token or plasctic figure).

+1 Control Token
49640c.name: Drama and Poetry

4ebe78.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

When attacking or defending, increase your combat value by 2.
4ebe78.name: Alhambra

5237e0.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
5237e0.name: Capitalism

5366f8.description:
Teddy Roosevelt

[Roosevelt Corollary]

When you gain or spend a natural wonder token, place it on any card in your focus row.

You can spend a natural wonder token on a focus card either as a trade token on that card or as a resource.

Технологии:
1. Каменная кладка.
2. Астрология.
3. Гончарное дело.
4. Ранняя империя.
5. Международная торговля.
5366f8.name: America

53b9c4.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the blue player.
53b9c4.name: Joint War

54c099.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 3 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Caravans travel to city-states and rival cities to gain trade tokens and diplomacy cards. Trade tokens increase a focus card's effect as descrived at the bottom of that card.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
54c099.name: Foreign Trade

591f61.description:
Cleopatra

[Moument Builders]

The cost of all world wonders is reduced by 1 for you.

Технологии:
1. Астрология.
2. Международная торговля.
3. Гончарное дело.
4. Каменная кладка.
5. Ранняя империя.
591f61.name: Egypt

5b838e.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space or this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

Then, if you build a city, place up to 2 control tokens adjacent to that city. Those tokens can be placed on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

+1 к производству чудес света
5b838e.name: Urbanization

5f4489.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When attacking or defending, increase your combat value by 2 for each of your caravans adjacent to the defending space.
5f4489.name: Big Ben

61f390.description:
[Экономика]

Переместите ваши караваны на расстояние до 6 ячеек каждый. Они могут пересекать лишь ячейки соответствующие типу местности текущего слота, а также воду.

Затем вы можете обменять 1 ваш ресурс на любой другой ресурс с рынка.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
61f390.name: Паровой двигатель

62054a.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When building cities, you can build in empty spaces on the edge of the map is if they were withing 2 spaces of a friendly space.
62054a.name: Great Lighthouse

633442.description: When you are building a wonder, reduce its cost by 1 for each of your mature cities.
633442.name: Брюссель

64d15e.description: The orange player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
64d15e.name: Open Borders

66b4f2.description: When you move a caravan to the orange player's capital (including the one used to take this card), place 1 trade token from the supply on a card in that player's focus row. Then, gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply.

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

+1 боевой бонус
6dd2cc.name: Flight

74ca64.description: When you are building a wonder, reduce its cost by 2 if you do not already have a wonder of its type.
74ca64.name: Buenos Aires

75525f.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

When you build this wonder, replace up to 2 cards in your focus row with cards of the next highest tech level of the same type.
75525f.name: Porcelain Tower

766833.description:
[Наука]

Получите 1 жетон торговли с рынка и поместите его на одну из ваших карт действий.

+1 Control Token
7e369c.name: Drama and Poetry

826f77.description:
Montezuma

[Legend of the Five Suns]

After you reset your military focus card, if you won at least 1 attack this turn, you may swap any 2 cards in your focus row.

Технологии:
1. Астрология.
2. Ранняя империя.
3. Международная торговля.
4. Каменная кладка.
5. Гончарное дело.
826f77.name: Aztec

844677.description: When you are resloving your industry or culture focus card, the terrain difficulty of forests is 1.
844677.name: Kumasi

84540a.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 3 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Caravans travel to city-states and rival cities to gain trade tokens and diplomacy cards. Trade tokens increase a focus card's effect as descrived at the bottom of that card.

+1 боевой бонус
879256.name: Массовое производство

88c998.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

When placing control tokens, you can place them on empty forst spaces that are not adjacent to a friendly city.
88c998.name: Chichen Itza

89d8dd.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space or this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

8dd461.name: Replaceable Parts

973b30.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When attacking, increase your combat value by 2.

The target of your attack can be within any number of spaces. (You must still count to the target space normally.)
973b30.name: Pentagon

97818d.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

97f508.name: Embassy

98c9d4.name: Паровой двигатель

9c59d8.description:
Trajan

[All Roads Lead to Rome]

When you move a caravan from your economy card, it can move from any of your cities (even a city that is not mature).

Технологии:
1. Астрология.
2. Международная торговля.
3. Каменная кладка.
4. Ранняя империя.
5. Гончарное дело.
9c59d8.name: Rome

9d4b41.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

After you place a control token on a hill space, you may place a control token on 1 or more hill spaces adjacent to that space (which can trigger this effect again).
9d4b41.name: Stonehenge

9fff95.description: When you move a caravan to the blue player's capital (including the one used to take this card), place 1 trade token from the supply on a card in that player's focus row. Then, gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply.
9fff95.name: Embassy

a0307f.description:
[Наука]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
a0307f.name: Astrology

a39d2c.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
a39d2c.name: Currency

a4f3fd.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number, or, if this card is in the fifth slot, your production equals 7.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 4 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 к производству чудес света
a4f3fd.name: Nationalism

a71ff2.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 2 spaces of a friendly space. You combat value equals this slot's number.

A reinforced control token provides a defense bonus to its space and adjacent spaces. Attacking is an effective way to defeat barbarians, conquer city-states, and take control of rivals' world wonders.

+1 боевой бонус
a71ff2.name: Masonry

aa2e86.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
aa2e86.name: Currency

aa3bcc.description: At the start of your turn, you may return 1 diplomacy card you have taken from another player. If you do, choose and take a different diplomacy card from that player.
aa3bcc.name: Geneva

ac3d08.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokesn expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control token
ac3d08.name: Early Empire

ae2535.description:
[Culture]

Place 3 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, choose a rival control token within 2 spaces of a friendly space. If the rival token is unreinforced, replace it with 1 of your control tokens on then unreinforced side. If the rival token is reinforced, flip it to its unreinforced side.

+1 Control Token
ae2535.name: Mass Media

b0d8ef.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 6 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower, as well as water.

Once per turn, after you reset this card, choose another card in your focus row. Resolve that card as though it is in the first slot, but do not reset it.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
b0d8ef.name: Capitalism

b2af84.description:
[Наука]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
b2af84.name: Astrology

b3a17e.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 3 spaces of a friendly space.

Or, build 1 city on an empty space of this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly caravan.

+1 к производству чудес света
b3a17e.name: Animal Husbandry

b5995a.description:
[Modern Wonder]

After you resolve a focus card other than your economy card, you may resolve and reset your economy card.
b5995a.name: Estadio do Maracana

b6a219.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When attacking, increase your combat value by 2.
b6a219.name: Terracotta Army

b7bcb5.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may swap 2 adjacent cards in your focus row.
b7bcb5.name: Oracle

b8eda9.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 1, or plus 3 if attacking a barbarian.

+1 боевой бонус
b8eda9.name: Iron Working

b9d79f.description:
[Наука]

Получите 1 жетон торговли с рынка и поместите его на одну из ваших карт действий.

Затем поверните ваш диск технологий на число равное номеру этого слота.

+1 к повороту диска технологий
b9d79f.name: Математика

bbc9ed.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to attacks within 5 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 3. You can count through water, rival spaces, barbarians, and city-states.

+1 боевой бонус
bbc9ed.name: Flight

be3410.description:
[Наука]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
be3410.name: Astrology

c39e80.description:
Gilgamesh

[Epic Quest]

When you defeat a barbarian, gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply (in addition to a trade token).

Технологии:
1. Международная торговля.
2. Ранняя империя.
3. Астрология.
4. Каменная кладка.
5. Гончарное дело.
c39e80.name: Sumeria

c89543.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the red player is attacking.
c89543.name: Defensive Pact

c9b6f6.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the green player is attacking.
c9b6f6.name: Defensive Pact

ca589a.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, place 1 control token on a space matching this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly space.

+1 Control Token
ca589a.name: Civil Service

cb85b9.description: The red player's control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
cb85b9.name: Open Borders

cc3f9c.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When resolving your economy focus card, your caravans can move a total of 6 additional spaces, divided as you choose.
cc3f9c.name: Colossus

cd558f.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, you may move 1 of your control tokens to an adjacent, non-water space that is empty (dous not contain a token or plasctic figure).

+1 Control Token
cd558f.name: Drama and Poetry

ce2434.description:
[Modern Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may choose 2 rival control tokens on the map belonging to the same player. That player replaces 1 of those tokens with 1 of your unused, unreinforced control tokens.
ce2434.name: Eiffel Tower

d106da.description:
[Промышленность]

Постройте 1 чудо света. Количество единиц вашего производства равно номеру этого слота.

Или постройте 1 город на ячейке соответствующей типу местности текущего слота и на расстоянии до 2 ячеек от дружественной территории.

Чудеса света дают мощные, уникальные эффекты их владельцам. Города расширяют доступ игроков к новым областям карты и увеличивают количество чудес света, которые игрок может построить.

+1 к производству чудес света
d106da.name: Гончарное дело

d294c9.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
d294c9.name: Currency

d6bc38.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When attacking a rival space, increase your combat value by 4 if you have more reinforced control tokens on the map than the defending player.
d6bc38.name: Kremlin

d74103.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

You can place trade tokens on this card instead of on your focus cards, up to a limit of 4.

At the start of your turn, you may move trade tokens from this card to cards in your focus row.
d74103.name: Great Zimbabwe

d85cc8.description:
Use the board tiles in this bag and the water hexes to create an advanced map. 

Locations for these barbarians are on the B side of the tiles.

The B side can be found on State Two. DO NOT USE THE BACK OF THE TILES.
d85cc8.name: ADVANCED MAP BUILDING

de6630.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to 2 attacks within 3 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 1, or plus 3 if attacking a barbarian.

+1 боевой бонус
de6630.name: Iron Working

deb335.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Reinforce a number of your control tokens up to this slot's number.

Or, perform up to attacks within 5 spaces of a friendly space. Your combat value equals this slot's number plus 3. You can count through water, rival spaces, barbarians, and city-states.

+1 боевой бонус
deb335.name: Flight

e1607d.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When defending, increase you combat value by 5.
e1607d.name: Ruhr Valley

e25aa2.description: When attacking a city or a city-state other than Kabul, increase your combat value by 3.
e25aa2.name: Kabul

e2e073.description: When defending, increase your combat value by 2 unless the orange player is attacking.
e2e073.name: Defensive Pact

e396a0.description: Защищая или атакуя цель, отличную от Карфагена, добавьте себе по 1 боевому бонусу за каждые город-государство и дружественный город в пределах 2 ячеек от защищаемой ячейки.
e396a0.name: Карфаген

e58dac.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Control tokesn expand your territory, allowing you to acquire resources from the map and to mature your cities.

+1 Control token
e58dac.name: Early Empire

e5acb0.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, place 1 control token on a space matching this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly space.

+1 Control Token
e5acb0.name: Civil Service

e8ad30.description:
[Наука]

Advance your tech dial a number of spaces equals to this slot's number.

Advancing your tech dial allows you to replace the cards in your focus row with better versions that have special effects.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
e8ad30.name: Astrology

eb4369.description:
[Modern Wonder]

Rival control tokens contribute toward your cities' maturity.
eb4369.name: Sydney Opera House

ebfba6.description:
[Наука]

Gain 1 resource of your choice from the supply. You cannot gain a resource of a type that you already have.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
ebfba6.name: Replaceable Parts

ec9343.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may destroy 1 rival control token that is adjacent to a friendly space.
ec9343.name: Forbidden City

eeaf8f.description:
Tomyris

[People of the Steppe]

When attacking or defending grassland or hill space, increase your combat value by 3.

Технологии:
1. Ранняя империя.
2. Каменная кладка.
3. Астрология.
4. Международная торговля.
5. Гончарное дело.
eeaf8f.name: Scythia

f05892.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

When you build this wonder, choose up to 3 level-I cards in your focus row. Replace each with a level-II card of the same type.
f05892.name: Pyramids

f07c37.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 3 spaces of a friendly space.

Or, build 1 city on an empty space of this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly caravan.

+1 к производству чудес света
f07c37.name: Animal Husbandry

f0bee6.description: When you are resloving your industry or culture focus card, the terrain difficulty of forests is 1.
f0bee6.name: Kumasi

f10778.description:
[Экономика]

Move each of your caravans up to 4 spaces. They can move into spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

Your caravans can move into barbarians' spaces. If you move a caravan into a barbarian's space, defeat that barbarian without gaining a trade token.

+1 к расстоянию перемещения всем
f10778.name: Currency

f46c2d.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 3 spaces of a friendly space.

Or, build 1 city on an empty space of this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly caravan.

+1 к производству чудес света
f46c2d.name: Animal Husbandry

f5542a.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, you may move 1 of your control tokens to an adjacent, non-water space that is empty (dous not contain a token or plasctic figure).

+1 Control Token
f5542a.name: Drama and Poetry

f68f4c.description:
[Ancient Wonder]

At the start of your turn, you may place 1 control token on a space of terrain difficulty 4 or less that is adjacent to a friendly city.
f68f4c.name: Hanging Gardens

f8291f.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

When you resolve the card in the first or second slot of your focus row, you may treat it as being in the third slot of your row.
f8291f.name: Machu Picchu

f98449.description: At the start of your turn, you may move 1 barbarian to an adjacent, empty space.
f98449.name: Сеул

f9d6a1.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number, or, if this card is in the fifth slot, your production equals 7.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space of this slot's terrain or lower within 4 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

+1 к производству чудес света
f9d6a1.name: Nationalism

fac552.description: At the start of your turn, you may return 1 diplomacy card you have taken from another player. If you do, choose and take a different diplomacy card from that player.
fac552.name: Geneva

fad788.description:
[Промышленность]

Build 1 world wonder. Your production equals this slot's number.

Or, build 1 city on a legal space or this slot's terrain or lower within 5 spaces of a friendly space. You can count through water.

Then, if you build a city, place up to 2 control tokens adjacent to that city. Those tokens can be placed on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower.

+1 к производству чудес света
fad788.name: Urbanization

faf174.description:
[Culture]

Place 2 control tokens on spaces matching this slot's terrain or lower that are adjacent to friendly cities.

Then, place 1 control token on a space matching this slot's terrain or lower that is adjacent to a friendly space.

+1 Control Token
faf174.name: Civil Service

fba65e.description:
[Вооружённые силы]

Выполните до 2 атак в пределах 3 ячеек от дружественной территории. Ваш боевой бонус равен номеру этого слота плюс 2. Вы можете пересекать воду.

Затем укрепите ваши жетоны контроля в количестве, не превышающем номеру этого слота минус 1 за каждую выполненную вами атаку.

+1 боевой бонус
fba65e.name: Массовое производство

fcf9c4.description:
[Modern Wonder]

When you replace a focus card other than a science focus card, you do not have to replace it with a card of the same type.
fcf9c4.name: Oxford University

fdbf4e.description:
[Medieval Wonder]

You can have 4 diplomacy cards from each other player.

When you build this wonder, you may take a total of 3 diplomacy cards of your choice from other players.
fdbf4e.name: Potala Palace

ff27f5.description:
[Наука]

If you resolved this card in the fifth slot, choose 1 space. In that space and all adjacent spaces, destroy all unreinforced control tokens and flip all reinforced control tokens to their unreinforced side.

Then, advance your tech dial a number of spaces equal to this slot's number.

+1 Tech Dial Advancement
ff27f5.name: Nuclear Power

ffe8ca.description: When attacking, increase your combat value by 2 unless you are attacking the green player.
ffe8ca.name: Joint War
